en: Enemies do not have synergy buffs
ja: 敵同士のシナジー効果はない

en: The real Engrams of Chaos experience
Start with a boss on your team, but gain 1/4th engrams
ja: 通常ユニットの獲得エングラムは1/4になる
エングラムのゆりかご

en: A more chaotic chaos! A lot more units and many MANY more synergies!
ja: さらに混沌としたカオス！ユニットもさらに増えシナジー効果もさらにアップ！

en: Damage calc is defense - damage, cannot go below 1.\nAttack Speed determines which unit receives its tick first.
ja: ダメージ計算は防御力 - ダメージで、1 未満になることはありません。\n攻撃速度によって、どのユニットが最初にティックを受け取るかが決まります。

en:
[b]Controls[/b]
{UP_CONTROL} - Button Selection
{LEFT_RIGHT_CONTROL} - Choose Unit
{DOWN_CONTROL} - Synergy Selection
{SELECT_CONTROL} to select
ja:
[color=#FFCC00]操作[/color]
{UP_CONTROL} - ボタンの選択
{LEFT_RIGHT_CONTROL} - ユニットを選択してください
{DOWN_CONTROL} - シナジー選択
{SELECT_CONTROL} - 選択する
[color=#FFCC00]操作[/color]\n{ALL_CONTROL} - ユニットを移動する\n{SELECT_CONTROL} - 場所

en:
[b]Controls[/b]
{UP_CONTROL} - Unit Selection
{LEFT_RIGHT_CONTROL} - Choose synergy
{DOWN_CONTROL} - Button Selection
ja:
[color=#FFCC00]操作[/color]
{UP_CONTROL} - 単位の選択
{LEFT_RIGHT_CONTROL} - シナジーを選択
{DOWN_CONTROL} - ボタンの選択

[color=#FFCC00]操作[/color]
{UP_CONTROL} - シナジーの選択
{DOWN_CONTROL} - クラフトボタン
{SELECT_CONTROL} - 選択する

en:
[b]Controls[/b]
{UP_CONTROL} - Play Button
{DOWN_CONTROL} - Unit Selection
{SELECT_CONTROL} to select
ja:
[color=#FFCC00]操作[/color]
{UP_CONTROL} - 再生ボタン
{DOWN_CONTROL} - ユニットの選択
{SELECT_CONTROL} - 選択する

en:
[b]Controls[/b]
{LEFT_RIGHT_CONTROL} - Choose Engram
{DOWN_CONTROL} - Go Back
{SELECT_CONTROL} - Add Engram
{CANCEL_CONTROL} - Remove Engram
ja:
[color=#FFCC00]操作[/color]
{LEFT_RIGHT_CONTROL} - エングラムを選択
{DOWN_CONTROL} - 戻ってください
{SELECT_CONTROL} - エングラムを追加
{CANCEL_CONTROL} - エングラムを削除する

en:
[b]Controls[/b]
{LEFT_RIGHT_CONTROL} - Choose Engram
{DOWN_CONTROL} - Go Back
{SELECT_CONTROL} - Confirm Fusion
{CANCEL_CONTROL} - Remove Engram
ja:
[color=#FFCC00]操作[/color]
{LEFT_RIGHT_CONTROL} - エングラムを選択
{DOWN_CONTROL} - 戻ってください
{SELECT_CONTROL} - 融合の確認
{CANCEL_CONTROL} - エングラムを削除する

en: Units of this synergy get an attack increase at the start of the round.
ja: このシナジーのユニットは、ラウンドの開始時に攻撃力が増加します。

en: Units of this synergy gain max HP times however many unique synergies are on board.
ja: このシナジーのユニットは、ボード上のユニークなシナジーの数に応じて最大体力が増加します。

en: At the start of the round, remove an engram to buff all defense by chance.
ja: ラウンド開始時にエングラムを1つ削除し、確率で全ユニットの防御力を強化します。

en: A random unit is sacrificed, the rest of the team gets buffs.
ja: ランダムなユニットが犠牲になり、チームの残りのメンバーは強化を受けます。

en: Units of this synergy have increased defense.
ja: このシナジーのユニットは防御力が向上します。

en: A random enemy has their HP reduced.
ja: ランダムな敵の体力が減少します。
体力50%減少、攻撃速度50%減少

en: Units of this synergy get healed a percentage of max hp every tick.
ja: このシナジーのユニットは、毎ティックごとに最大体力の一定割合が回復します。

en: Units of this synergy have increased attack speed based on how many unit types are in play
ja: このシナジーのユニットは、プレイ中のユニットタイプの数に応じて攻撃速度が上昇します。

en: A percentage of damage dealt by units of this synergy are true damage.
ja: このシナジーを持つユニットが与えるダメージの割合は、貫通ダメージです。

en: Units of this synergy jump to enemies and have increase crit chance.
ja: このシナジーを持つユニットは敵に向かってジャンプし、クリティカル確率が増加します。
クリティカル確率5%増加
クリティカル確率10%増加

en: A 3 in 1 combo! Prepare for mass destruction!
ja: 3 in 1コンボ！大量破壊に備えよ！

en: Half of your team shall return to dough...
ja: あなたのチームの半分は生地に戻ります...

en: Get moving, Get groving, its shuffling time!
ja: 動いて、動いて、シャッフルの時間だよ！

en: Don't let the heat cloud your mind, a unit each tick will get burnt alongside those in line.
ja: 暑さで気が曇らないようにしてください。1 ティックごとに 1 ユニットが、列に並んでいる人とともに焼かれます。

en: Brrr... So chilly! Each tick, half your team will be FROZEN.
ja: ぶるぶる…寒い！ティックごとに、チームの半分が凍り付いてしまいます。

en: The blades spin quickly! When this gets hit, the whole board gets shuffled. Any units near the blender after this gets hit!
ja: ブレードが高速回転！これがヒットすると、盤面全体がシャッフルされます。その後、ブレンダーの近くにあるユニットはすべてヒットします！

en: A stack of plates to the skies above. When the pile gets hit twice, the pile will crumble a bit and spawn a plate enemy.
ja: 空高く舞い上がるプレートの山。2回攻撃を受けると、少し崩れてプレート型の敵が出現します。

en: 30% of your team will betray you, when any enemy gets a kill they all benefit! Stop the rottening quick!
ja: チームの30%が離反します。敵がキルを獲得すると、敵に利益がもたらされます！速やかに腐敗を止めてください！

en: All our food keeps blowing up! Every 5 ticks, a random ally blows up and the kettle heals from it.
ja: 食べ物が次々と爆発！5ティックごとにランダムな味方が爆発し、ケトルがそのエネルギーを吸収する！

en: Don't be too loud... The boss will turn into a random unit with 3 times stats.
ja: あまり大声を出さないでください...ボスは3倍のステータスを持つランダムなユニットに変わります。

en: Every time this unit attacks, it's attack speed increases by 2%
ja: このユニットが攻撃するたびに、攻撃速度が2%増加します。

en: {ABILITY}: Attacks the enemy, adding the  defense to damage.
ja: {ABILITY}: 敵を攻撃し、ダメージに防御力を加えます。
{ABILITY}: 隣接する味方全員を15回復する

en: This unit's damage is proportional to the unit's hp. 100% HP = 200% Attack
ja: このユニットのダメージはユニットの体力に比例します。体力100%は攻撃力200%に相当します。

en: Any enemies that attack this unit lose 5% of their attack speed
ja: このユニットを攻撃する敵は攻撃速度が5%低下する

en: ABILITY: Increase crit chance  all neighboring allies by 10%
ABILITY: Heal all allies by their attack + defense
ABILITY: Heals all neighboring allies by 2x their defense
ABILITY: Decrease the attack of every enemy by 3
Wants to see the world burn.
ABILITY: This unit's attack and defense swap
Every enemy this unit attacks, target looses 3 spell mana
ABILITY: Target can no longer crit
When this attacks, heal 3% of the enemies defense
ABILITY: This unit's target loses 7 defense
When this unit jumps, Increase crit chance by 10%
When this unit dies, spawn a mini cheese where it died.
When this unit attacks, it deals all its true damage again in another attack.
ABILITY: Attack the enemy with an attack that deals 3x damage
At the start of the round, if the sweet synergy is higher than 4 this gains a large buff.
Every tick, Allies in the same column as this unit have increased attack speed
On the second tick, if there has been a overall stat increase, this unit gains increased max hp
Every 10 ticks spawn another fractal somewhere on the board
Every tick, increase an ally's stats by random amounts ( can go down )
Every tick, If a negative stat changed happened on the team last tick, gain 5 max hp
ABILITY: Attacks the enemy with attack times greed synergy level
When this attacks, freeze the enemy (excluding Bosses)
At the round start, the unit to the right of this has the same stats as the unit to the left.
ABILITY: This unit strikes the enemy with 5 times their damage, then decreases their damage by 2
ABILITY: Heal this unit by how many engrams you have.
At the start of the round, turn into the unit to the left of this
Every tick, allies surrounding this gain 5% crit chance
When this gets attacked, the attacker looses 1 defense.
When this dies, spawn the last ally whos died here.
ABILITY: Flip a coin. If heads, double damage, if tails, half defense
Every time this unit attacks, it's damage increases by one, but its speed decreases
ABILITY: Hits the target, but also hits any enemies surrounding the target
When this unit gets hit, It jumps to its starting position and gains 1 defense.
This unit's crit chance will go up every attack. Once it crits, it resets to 10%
ABILITY: Allies in the same column as this unit gain 1 defense and attack
Once this reaches 30% HP, It's defences increase by 7
ABILITY: This unit becomes frozen for a tick, giving another unit a bonus action
When this gets hit, equally distribute the hit between neighboring allies
At the start of the round, this unit dies, passing its stats to the unit to the left
ABILITY: Strike the enemy with damage * the number of point tokens on the team
At the start of the round, Kill a random ally, Then when this dies revive the ally
Every tick, Allies in the same row as this unit have increased attack speed
ABILITY: Increase the range of this unit by 1
ABILITY: Attacks the target based on how many engrams you have.
ABILITY: Spawn a scribble somewhere on the board
At the round start, the units to the left and right of this have averaged stats.
